page.title: 03FARMING AROUND BUCHLYVIE 2
page.content: {BEEF AND SHEEP FARMS: OXHILL,135 {ACRES,}125 ewes, 120 bullocks and crops of hay, barley and turnips;{ {THIRDS,156 ACRES,}200 ewes,45 beef cows and crops of oats,hay and barley; {HEIGHTS,186 ACRES,}140 bullocks,8 multi-suckling cows, 250 sheep over-wintered and crops of barley, hay and turnips;{BLAIRGORTS,145 ACRES,}140 stirks, 14 multi-suckling cows, 140 Blackface ewes and lambs and crops of hay, oats, barley and turnips;{ {BLACKHOUSE,100 ACRES,}60 bullocks, 3 cows, 50 sheep and crops of hay and barley; {KNOCKINSHANNOCH,76 ACRES,}70 bullocks, 2 cows and crops of hay and barley;{EASTER MYE,100 ACRES,}80 bullocks and crops of hay, barley and turnips;{MAINS OF BUCHLYVIE,200 ACRES, 250 cross ewes, 10 Suffolk ewes, 40 bullocks, 150 hens and crops of potatoes, hay, silage and vegetables.
